  • Uses of Coord in it.project.weather.services

    Methods in it.project.weather.services with parameters of type Coord
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    org.json.simple.JSONObject
    WeatherServiceImpl.historicalWeatherAPI(Coord coord, Date start)
    This method call the Historical API from OpenWeather, it returns the JSON of weather hour by hour.
    org.json.simple.JSONObject
    WeatherServiceImpl.oneCallAPI(Coord coord, Vector<String> exclude)
    This method call the OneCallAPI from OpenWeather, it always returns a response unless there are errors in OpenWeather servers.
